resources.string: 1) You can Record and Upload your Video using the Upload Video Button
2) The progress bar is included to show you the progress of how much percent of uploading is done
3) You can see all your Uploaded video by clicking Video Library Button
4) You can Logout by clicking on the Logout Button
May I ask your phone number?
Double Tap to detect the number or enter number using +91
Wait for the code I sent You
